Body:
"""Test that the wrong journal in the YAML compared to DOI lookup is an error.
        """
authors = [{'name': 'Zhuyin Ren'}, {'name': 'Yufeng Liu'}, {'name':
    'Liuyan Lu'}, {'name': 'Oluwayemisi O Oluwole'}, {'name':
    'Graham M Goldin'}, {'name': 'Tianfeng Lu'}]
result = v.validate({'reference': {'year': 2014, 'authors': authors,
    'volume': 161, 'pages': '127-137', 'doi':
    '10.1016/j.combustflame.2013.08.018', 'journal': 'Bad Journal'}},
    update=True)
assert not result
assert 'journal should be Combustion and Flame' == v.errors['reference'][0]
internet_missing
